TEXT_NAME.APPLY_ACTIONS_TO_BUY_INTERFACE: Apply following actions to the Buying Interface
TEXT_NAME.APPLY_ACTIONS_TO_SELL_INTERFACE: Apply following actions to the Selling Interface
TEXT_NAME.IGNORE_SIMILAR_TRADE: 忽略当前面板物品X分钟

TIPS.APPLY_ACTIONS_TO_BUY_INTERFACE: Any actions following this action will be applied to the Buying Interface.
TIPS.APPLY_ACTIONS_TO_SELL_INTERFACE: Any actions following this action will be applied to the Selling Interface
TIPS.CLOSE_ALL_TABS: Close all tabs at once, including the currently focused tab.
TIPS.CLOSE_SIMILAR_TABS: Close all other tabs or slots with the same combination of item name, price and stash location as the currently focused tab/slot.
TIPS.COPY_ITEM_INFOS: Copy the currently focused tab/slot item informations, for usage with the in-game stash search.
TIPS.IGNORE_SIMILAR_TRADE: Trading whispers with the same combination of item name, price and stash location as the currently focused tab/slot will not trigger any notification.
TIPS.SAVE_TRADE_STATS: Save the trade stats of the currently focused slot. Trade stats can be seen in the "My Stats" Interface.
TIPS.SEND_MSG: Send a message into the chat. Can be used with Trading Variables.
TIPS.SENDEVENT: Use the SendEvent command from AutoHotKey. Can be used with Trading Variables.
TIPS.SENDINPUT: Use the SendInput command from AutoHotKey. Can be used with Trading Variables.
TIPS.SLEEP: Use the Sleep command from AutoHotKey, to add a delay before continuing with the next action.
TIPS.WRITE_MSG: Write a message into the chat without sending it. If %goBackHere% is included, the cursor will be set at that position; it allows to change the message on-the-fly (by manually inputing how many maps you have for example). Can be used with Trading Variables.

GUI_ChooseLang.hTEXT_TopText:
感谢您选择POE Trades Companion!
在您开始使用前,
请先选择您所需要的语言:

GUI_Settings.CreateHotkeyForThisButton: Create a hotkey for this button
GUI_Settings.GuiPoeAccounts_TopText: https://www.pathofexile.com/my-account Account names are case senitive. Your account name will be used for the Price Verify feature and the /kick %myself% action. Note that the %myself% variable will only work if your profile access is set to public.
GUI_Settings.hBTN_RecreateTradesGUI: 点击该按钮应用当前修改
GUI_Settings.hCB_AutoFocusNewTabs: 交易面板自动切换至最新
GUI_Settings.hCB_AutoFocusNewTabs_ToolTip:
当有新交易信息时, 自动将该交易信息对应的面板弹出至最前.
默认: 未勾选

注意, 只有当您自己在您藏身处时此选项才会生效.

Enabled: Minimizing the interface is based on its bottom position.

GUI_Settings.hCB_SendTradingWhisperUponCopyWhenHoldin:
按住CTRL并点击Whisper,
 自动切换至游戏并密语卖家

This can be useful to know if they are currently mapping.

Show trading whisper count button
on screen corner while tabbed out?

GUI_Settings.hIMG_PoE_ToolTip: 访问该项目的官网帖子页面
GUI_Settings.hTEXT_About:
POE Trades Companion (POE TC) 旨在增强您的POE交易体验。
当您从交易网站收到一个交易密语时，插件会弹出可视化面板以供您点击。
除了常规的退队/组队等按钮外，插件还支持方便的快捷行为按钮，
同时支持设置键盘快捷键来完成特定行为，让您轻松完成交易。

简体中文汉化: 啊咪 https://discord.gg/zArGXeS 欢迎来反馈任何有关汉化的错误或建议 
WDNMD, 祝各位身体健康, 多多出货嗷

MessageBoxes.GameSettingsFileNotFound:
您的配置文件 production_Config.ini 找不到啦!
此文件是必要的, 因为插件要读取其中的"发送信息"快捷键.
您仍然可以使用该插件, 但是插件会默认将"发送信息"键认定为 "回车键" .
MessageBoxes.MyStats_ConfirmDeleteThisEntry:
注意, 此操作不可逆!!!
您确认要删除词条交易记录吗?

%entry%
MessageBoxes.ReloadAsAdmin_Msg:
无法和游戏进程交互 (PID "%pid%"). 因为游戏是以管理员身份运行的, 而本插件只是普通权限. 后续为了避免此情况发生, 插件也必须是以管理员身份运行. 
您希望插件现在就重新以管理员身份启动吗? 请放心, 当前所有交易窗口仍会保留.
MessageBoxes.Settings_CannotMoveDownBcsLastIsCloseTab: 您无法下移当前步骤, 因为上个步骤 (%lastAction%) 已经把交易面板关掉了.
MessageBoxes.Settings_CannotMoveDownBcsLastIsWrite: 您无法下移当前步骤, 因为上个步骤 (%lastAction%) 只是输入信息而不是发送出去. 此时聊天框尚未关闭.
MessageBoxes.Settings_CannotMoveUpBcsItsCloseTab: 您无法上移此步骤, 因为此步骤已经关闭了交易面板, 您无法进行后面的步骤.
MessageBoxes.Settings_CannotMoveUpBcsItsWrite: 您无法上移此步骤, 因为此步骤会导致聊天框仍处于激活状态, 您无法进行后面的步骤.
MessageBoxes.Settings_ConfirmResetToDefault:
您确定要重置到默认设置吗?
您的当前设置会被备份.

备份的设置文件路径为 "%folder%"
MessageBoxes.Settings_LastActionIsCloseTab: 您无法添加当前步骤 (%thisAction%) . 因为上个步骤 (%lastAction%) 已经把面板关掉了.
MessageBoxes.Settings_LastActionIsWrite: 您无法添加当前步骤 (%thisAction%) . 因为上个步骤 (%lastAction%) 只是输入信息而不是发送出去. 这种情况下聊天框尚未关闭, 可能会导致其他步骤出错.
MessageBoxes.Settings_RemoveSelectedHotkeyProfile: Are you sure to delete this hotkey profile?
MessageBoxes.Settings_ThisActionCanOnlyBeLast:
该步骤 (%thisAction%) 在此按钮上只能作为最后一步. 如果把该步骤放在其他步骤的话会导致插件出错.
举例: 比如您将 "输入..." 步骤放在最后, 会导致聊天框仍然处于可编辑状态.
比如您将 "关闭聊天面板" 放在最后一步, 会导致该面板再也不会弹出.
请重新调整.
MessageBoxes.UpdatePrompt_Msg:
当前版本: %version%
可用更新: %update%

您希望现在就更新吗?.

ToolTips.StringHasToStartWith: The string has to start with %text%
ToolTips.TradingVariables:
%buyer%	Active tab buyer name
Example:	/invite %buyer%

%seller%		Active tab seller name
Example		/hideout %seller%

%item%		Active tab item name
%price%		Active tab item price
Example:	@%buyer% Party invite sent for %item% for %price%

%lws%		Name of the last person you whispered
%lwr%		Name of the last person who whispered you

%myself%	Your logged in character
Example:	/kick %myself%

%tradingWhisper%		The trading whisper sent to this seller
Example:		@%seller% %tradingWhisper%
ToolTips.ValueCanBeIntegerOnly: This value can only be an integer.
